To keep your money in PayPal, we need a bit more information
Confirming customer identities is one of the ways we help keep your account secure. You\'ll generally only need to do this once.
We need a bit more information
We couldn\'t confirm your identity using your photo ID. To keep your money in your PayPal account, we need a bit more information from you.
Confirming customer\'s identities is one of the ways we help keep your account secure. You\'ll generally only need to do this once.

Place your photo ID on a flat surface and aim your device directly at it. Make sure you have good lighting or turn on the flash.\nHold your device level and steady and tap the camera icon to take a photo manually.
Your money is now available in your PayPal balance. You can send it, spend it or just keep it for a rainy day.
There\'s an issue with your account
We\'re sorry, we\'ve hit a snag.
Check again in a little while.
We\'re sorry, it\'s taking a little longer than we expected. When we\'ve finished reviewing your driving licence, we\'ll notify you. Look out for it in the next 5 minutes.
We\'ll update you as soon as we\'ve finished.
